variables.begin:
(?x)
(?=
  \b
  (
    (void|boolean|byte|char|short|int|float|long|double)
    |
    (?>(\w+\.)*[A-Z_]+\w*) # e.g. `String`
  )
  \b
  \s*
  (
    <[\w<>,\.?\s\[\]]*> # e.g. `HashMap<Integer, String>`, or `List<metadsl.lang.String>`
  )?
  \s*
  (
    (\[\])* # int[][]
  )?
  \s+
  [A-Za-z_$][\w$]* # At least one identifier after space
  ([\w\[\],$][\w\[\],\s]*)? # possibly primitive array or additional identifiers
  \s*(=|:|;)
)
variables.name: meta.definition.variable.metadsl
